summary: Replaces odaviing with a custom dragon
descriptionHtml:
the reason wannabe is in the name is cause its the closer look i coude achive to Kalameet from dark souls i wanted to use as a base the vanila dragon for 2 reasons 1st cause the mod  was first a test to see if i coude create a custom mesh that worked and 2nd if i made the dragon from scratch with scalptris (the program i use) the textures woude be in gezilion pieces . 
i made the dragon using as a refrence screenshots and the official art of the game  normaly what i woude do whoude be me going in the game and see the creature but in dark souls this is imposible so there is no way in million its identical to the normal.

 i added experemntal fron legs they dont move but they ad effect when the dragon flyes   let me know if you like them 


tools used :

blender
3dMax
gimp
author: milisot1325
